name: G.R.E.E.N. T.E.A. and The Grandfather Paradox
name_original: G.R.E.E.N. T.E.A. and The Grandfather Paradox
description:
You are an agent for T.E.A and have been assigned a mission to terminate an enemy of the agency.

Made for Ludum Dare 47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/g-r-e-e-n-t-e-a-and-the-grandfather-parad...
